title: What to Wear?
description: What do you think will happen when a space alien is given human clothes to wear? Will the clothes fit? How will the alien put them on? Readers will find out in the funny story What to Wear? Colorful and entertaining illustrations and high-frequency words support emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify characters in the story while they practice visualizing while they read.
reviewWords: closet, clothes, gives, space, style, takes
comprehension: Identify Characters and Setting                : Identify characters in a story
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words how, some, you
